page.title: 02VISITING THE DOCTOR
page.content: VISITING THE DOCTOR IN 1985 by J0ANNE COOKSEY EDITED by NICHOLAS HARVEY AT 1.25 MY MUM CAME AND FETCHED ME AND MY BROTHER FROM SCHOOL.WE WENT OVER TO THE SURGERY FOR A CHECK UP.WE WAITED IN THE WAITING ROOM FOR ABOUT 10 MINUTES.THEN A LADY CALLED US WE WENT DOWN A CORIDOR TO GET WEIGHED.I WEIGHED 4 St 3 AND MY HEIGHT WAS 4 Ft 2 ins.WE WENT BACK DOWN TO THE WAITING ROOM FOR ANOTHER 5 MINS.WE GOT CALLED BACK DOWN THE CORRIDOR.WE WENT INTO A SMALL ROOM AND GOT UNDRESSED TO OUR VEST AND PANTS.THEN DOCTOR PARKER CAME.HE ASKED ME WHO WAS GOING TO BE EXAMINED FIRST?I SAID MARK CAN BE EXAMINED FIRST.MARK WENT UP TO HIM.THE DOCTOR EXAMINED HIM CAREFULLY. HE LOOKED IN HIS EYES,IN HIS EARS AND AT HIS HANDS.MARK SAID "HE'S TELLING MY FUTURE".WE ALL LAUGHED.THEN IT WAS MY TURN.HE FELT MY BACK.
